mapper.select: SELECT * FROM user WHERE user.password=#{password} AND user.phone=#{phoneOrEmail} OR user.email=#{phoneOrEmail}
SELECT user.password FROM user WHERE user.identify=#{identify} AND user.phone=#{phoneOrEmail} OR user.email=#{phoneOrEmail}
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET user.last_login_time=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() WHERE user.id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(id, name, gender, identify, student_id, location, email, phone, password) VALUES (#{id},#{name},#{gender},#{identify}, #{studentID},#{location},#{email},#{phone},#{password})
